title: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 25: Shin-chan Shuurai! Uchuujin Shiriri
alternative_title: 映画クレヨンしんちゃん　襲来!! 宇宙人シリリ
description: The film's story begins when Shiriri, an alien, arrives and turns Hiroshi and Misae into children. To turn them back, Shinnosuke must travel the length of Japan with Shiriri hidden in his butt. Meanwhile, Shiriri's father is moving forward with a huge conspiracy.
